1.content:
Now, I know I said you'd get to start right away, but there is something I feel I need to say, this story can have ANYTHING in it, as long as it starts with the setting I gave, meaning sex, murder, mind control, etc. are all fair game.

Thank you.

Now, will you be telling your story in first or second person view?
1.title: The first steps in the journey of a lifetime.

11.content:
And now the obligatory choice page, where I'll add lots of choices so you can start your own story.

(I'll rename it to the name of the author of the first chapter, example: JS173's story, etc.)
11.title: First(I)

1153.content: On and on it goes, where it stops...I guess I might know...>.>...
1153.title: Some More

choices: One man wanted me to "Service" him ..........
11531.content:
One night I had a dream ... a Wonderful dream !

I dreamed I was in ancient Rome in one of the bathhouses, I was a very hard worker for the Emperor and worked in his palace as one of the servants yet the real kicker was that I was ten years old and had traded my services for my family's taxes, we made little money and by tax time we did not have close to enough and we all dreaded even thinking about where we would end up when we were displaced without a home.

My parents were not crazy about the idea but we needed the money, so I traded my tenth year to pleasing everyone at the bathhouse.
My first day there was crazy ... so many people were there eating , drinking and having so much fun, only I was the one serving everyone, I would bring fresh towels to all the patrions and would do whatever someone told me.

...........
11531.title: Story 7

choices: I was that ten year old boy & Fritz was one of the bathhouse patrons.
115312.content:
The Emperor called for me and wanted me to ............

Whew, that was a weird dream I thought but at the same time I wanted to see the old Roman Empire so I called up Edward Fritz, Fritz to his friends and by that I mean me ... we are what people would call nerds but very smart nerds ......... I came up with the design to build a time machine and Fritz knew what to do to make it a reality for us.

After three months and lots of money we actually built the T.M. and today was the moment of truth.
As we started up the machine it made lots of weird noises and after we got into the machine it was spinning so fast that I thought we would be ripped apart but just as I was about to black out there was a blinding searing white hot light and as we awoke we were just outside of the palace gates but .............
115312.title: The Emperor  wanted me to .....

choices: slip in beside him and lay down.
1153122.content:
Just as we got our wits about us ... The Royal Brigade came around the bend and We could see that Emperor Caligula was leading the battalion .... as they rode up to us the Emperor stopped and asked us who we were, startled we just stammered something like (Fritz) I am Mosa and my family sent me out in the wild to catch our family some dinner and I said " I am Solus and I have come to the Emperors Palace to find work" .

Emperor Caligula stopped and waved Mosa off and said be gone with you Mosa, you family is waiting, and I watched Fritz run off into the distance ... there I was before the Emperor Caligula waiting as he looked me over ... 'ok then boy, you will be my personal servant ... UNDERSTAND " ... I just agreed and said thank you, the Emperor then said to the guards " Take Solus here up to my chambers" and then rode past me, just as quickly the guards scooped me up and carried me inside the gates and up to the Emperors Massive Villa where they told other servants to wash me and feed me and when finished, to have me in light attire and waiting in the Emperors bed chambers.

As the servants took me inside, two of them ran off to get me food and two boys were left to get me cleaned up, while bathing in the palace one of the boys said in a whisper, "Caligula must really like you to just meet you and send you off to his chambers" I just looked at the boy and asked " Why do you say that ? ' ... then the other boy says ... ' "it took months for me to make it to the Emperors bed chambers and I was only there once, I must not have been good enough in bed for him to call me back" ...I just looked at the boy and wondered if what he said really happened.

You finish bathing and the food is brought in, after eating your fill the boys were escorting you to the bed chambers when the last boy who spoke to you added... " remember, if you want to be in good graces with the Emperor , do as he says and then do more on your own to please him, he has killed many people for any reason that he wants... just be prepared to do Anything and EVERYTHING for the Emperor and for your own safety".

After a few minutes you are left at the door when you open the door and walk in, there in his huge bed lays Caligula wearing only a sheet over him telling you to join him as he pats the bed beside him ...(gulp) you slowly walk over to the giant bed and he lifts the covers up calling for me to join him .......... what do I do ?
1153122.title: Open Choice

11533.content: I wonder if it'll even make it to this many stories...oh well.
11533.title: MORE!!

115332.content: now it's only one new story a page...guess I'll leave it here 'till I need more...do I need more?
115332.title: More(slowin' down)

12.title: Second(You)

121.content:
You were always interested in girls with bigger assets, also you got a bio-engineering degree to help you to fulfill your dreams instead of a surgeon degree... why? because you were not fond of implants anyways, you preffered the natural feel against the silicone feel.

Secretely, you were designing a kind of bacteria that will make mamaries to get bigger, nipples puffier and tissue adapted, but it was just today that you could get the funds and help to create this living bacteria a reality. This bacteria was engineer-crafted to live and contagion in any kind of liquid, be either water, urine or even blood.

A few test subjects were donated from a women's prison. These subjects were infected with the bacteria and soon their breasts swole potentially, however there was a side effect...
121.title: The bigger the better.

1211.content:
The feet of the test subjects started growing too in all axis, this effect was not previewed by you, but seems that the bacteria evolved a tad quickier than you could expect. Shriping sounds came from both the victims' tops and socks as the assets expanded several times their original size, suddenly these girls were nothing but a pair of walking tits.

But the surprises never end, another side effect came to the place, you were astonished as...
1211.title: and even bigger, even better.

12113.content:
The test subject swole more not only on her feet and breasts, but also in their bodies getting ripped as if it was part of the side effects, some of them started sweating heavilly others had blader failures, the floor was soon covered with this selective bacteria, a bacteria that only affects girls.

now i forgot about this question but... are you a boy or a girl?
12113.title: girls became more muscular

info.brief_description: I give you the starting rules, and you make the story, based on how you think you'd react.
info.description:
Welcome!

This interactive is one that will have limited control, I will edit the chapters that are hard to read, and delete ones that don't serve any purpose(such as just being a jerk to someone else).

Only rules are the following;
1) There is only 1 main character, you, the story is to be in first or second person(either you, or I)
2) When you make your first chapter, there is a setting to follow, after that, where it goes is up to you.

I believe that's all I'm going to make into rules, I can't think of anything else...as I said, very limited control here.


Story Setting(this is how it will start)
....................................................
You are a very smart person, but you lack the skills to build anything yourself, you can design nearly anything, and you've made a few minor inventions, which you've licensed and sold, so you get a pretty good income.

You just came up with a good design for a new invention, and are heading to a friend's workshop, they're very good with tools, and can build nearly anything as long as they have the blueprints, together you and your friend make a team that can make nearly anything happen...
....................................................

And that is where the story shall begin, what did you design? What's it do? Where will it take you? To a life of fame and fortune? To the stars?

It's all up to you.
info.pretty_title: What To Do? - A Scientific Fantasy
